text: Ellen DeGeneres is a talk show host, comedienne, activist and wife. She ’ s even the voice of Pixar ’ s bumbling but lovable Dory. She ’ s beloved by many for her warm, fun - loving style. But the one person who matters most is her wife. In a message she wrote to partner Portia de Rossi on their ninth wedding anniversary, she honored “ wife ” as her greatest title. On the big day, she posted a photo of the two on the day they got married and captioned the snap, “ @ PortiadeRossi and I got married 9 years ago today.
